display_long_description:
Challenge Your Mind Like Never Before — In Mixed Reality!
Step into the world of Hand Puzzles, a beautifully immersive collection of five timeless logic games, reimagined for your real-world space. 

Sharpen your logic. Train your focus. Enjoy endless replayability.

Included Games:

Slide the Block
Shift wooden blocks on a dynamic grid to free the main piece. With increasing complexity across levels, you'll test your spatial awareness and strategic planning.

Towers of Hanoi
This legendary logic puzzle comes alive in MR! Stack and move glowing discs across rods to recreate the tower. Easy to pick up—tough to master.

Stick Puzzles
Rearrange glowing Sticks to fix equations or create visual patterns. Simple at first glance, yet deeply rewarding and endlessly challenging.

Marble Solitaire
A test of foresight and precision—jump marbles over one another to clear the board. Beautifully animated and enhanced with realistic interaction.

New Game : Tangram Puzzle
Sharpen your mind and spatial skills—combine colorful triangle pieces to recreate intricate shapes. Now smoother, faster, and more intuitive than ever!

New Updates: Added support for Controllers as well.
